name: Crossboat
description:
Crossboat is a timed arcade style game where you row down a river with your crossbow-equipped boat. Collect as many gold chests as you can and avoid the rocks using your crossbow. Each chest you collect increases your time. Get as far down the river as you can!

Let me know how far you make it! My current record is 7201 meters.

Controls

W - forward(hold)

A - rotate left

D - rotate right

S - backward(hold)

Hold left click - fire crossbow

Release left click - detach line

Tips

- Use your crossbow to control your movement

- Use WASD for small moves while grappling

- Collect gold chests as fast as possible

- Avoid rocks as they can slow you down and spin you

- Have fun!
